document_data.caption: Excerpt from the cover of [[City of Torment]] depicting Anusha's dream form trapped in [[Xxiphu]].
document_data.name: Anusha Marhana
document_data.mainbody:
'Anusha Marhana''' was the spoiled daughter of the [[Marhana]] merchant family.  

{{quote|''Anusha followed the direction of the woman's terrified vision, into the face of the mirror-like shield... and something looked back at Anusha. A humanoid silhouette of purest black, outlined in erratic white and blue flashes. She recognized the silhouette as her own.''}}
document_data.History: In [[1396 DR]], she discovered that she had an uncanny ability to create an astral projection of herself when sleeping (it likely being a form of [[spellscar]]). Using her abilities, she stowed away on Captain [[Thoster]]'s ''[[Green Siren]]''. Later she was lost within the dreams of the [[Eldest]] in her dream form, where she met [[Yeva]].
document_data.Family: Her mother and father were both killed in [[Sembia]]. She was the younger half-sister of [[Behroun Marhana]].
